mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAILS (ORDERDETAILID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, PRICE) VALUES (ORDER_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT od.ORDERDETAILID as orderDetailId, od.ORDERID as orderId, od.PRODUCTID as productId, od.QUANTITY as quantity, od.PRICE as price, p.PROD_NAME as prodName FROM ORDER_DETAILS od JOIN PRODUCT_DB p ON od.PRODUCTID = p.PROD_ID WHERE od.ORDERID = #{orderId}
